shot.composition: Medium close-up, focus on the barista's hands and the coffee cup, shallow depth of field (creamy bokeh) to isolate the action.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Gimbal smooth motion, slight forward tracking (dolly in) for 1 second to emphasize the latte art detail, then static stabilization. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.
